Name: Cygnus Pizza Race
About the game: Welcome to the greatest challenge in the Cygnus Galaxy: Getting a deliveration job with the Cygnus Pizza Federation! Compete against the galaxyâ€™s finest pizza delivery wannabes in this high-speed thrill ride! Challenge your friendships and sabotage your friends in two-person, arcade-style head-to-head local races that put your piloting skills to the test in . . . The Cygnus Pizza Race! Can you bring home the gold by getting a perfect score on the challenging tracks? Speed, accuracy, and well-timed sabotage are vital if you want to be the best of the best. Season Two builds on the ten tracks and three ships of Season One and adds new tracks, new ships, and new music! Every month of Season Two a new track is released. Join the monthly tournaments to be the first to race on the new tracks, and even get a chance to win some cool prizes.
